Title

Jason Kao

March 25, 2021

The three letters in the word “Kao” always seemed less Eastern to me — less than, at least, the Chen’s and Wu’s and Li’s who were read off attendance roll calls like huge families arriving at a restaurant. I felt that Kao made me different somehow, different in a good way. The name wasn’t as Asian. It wasn’t as revealing. No one would know that I was Asian, at least at that nominal stage of interaction.

Footer.
